definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The standard American edition of the Revised Version appeared in 1901.
sentences.chinese: 1901年标准美国版本的《修订本圣经》正式发行。

sentences.english: He asked to see the amended version.
This revised edition has corrected several obvious mistakes in the previous editions.
sentences.chinese: 这个修订本纠正了以前版本的几个明显的错误。

sentences.english: This revised edition is incomparable with the earlier ones.
sentences.chinese: 这一修订本不可与先前的版本同日而语。

sentences.english: She did some revision for the exam.
sentences.chinese: 那书的修订本即将出版。

sentences.english: Copy of scope of supply and amendments.
sentences.chinese: 供应范围和修订本的副本。

sentences.english: The history of Chinese landscape painting.
The Governor may by order published in the Gazette amend any Schedule to this Ordinance.
sentences.chinese: 总督可借宪报命令修订本条例任何附表。

sentences.english: I have got the revision of his dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我得到了他编的词典的修订本。

definition: Cihai, an encyclopedic dictionary first published in 1915, and frequently revised
Hanyu Da Zidian, one of the most comprehensive Chinese character dictionaries with 54,678 (and later 60,370) entries, first published between 1986-1990
to revise and enlarge (a book)/to augment a purchase order
a series of books/a collection of books
Hanyu Da Cidian, the largest Chinese dictionary, with over 375,000 word entries, first published 1986-1994
